summary: The module provides tokenization utilities for the Kolors diffusion pipeline, including a specialized tokenizer for the ChatGLM conversational model that formats chat messages and manages special and padding tokens, as well as a generic SentencePiece‑based tokenizer for general text encoding and decoding.
business_intent: Enable reliable conversion of user prompts and chat histories into model‑compatible token sequences for the Kolors pipeline, supporting proper handling of special tokens, padding, and token ID mapping to improve text‑to‑image generation.
